alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 5:59PM PST until January 09 at 11:43AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Washington... Chehalis River At Centralia affecting Lewis County. .Heavy rain has ended and the river has crested. With drier conditions expected through the weekend, the river will continue to recede and will fall below flood stage on Sunday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chehalis River At Centralia. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 170.5 feet, the Chehalis River in Lewis County will flood Riverside Golf Course...farms...and some residential areas around Florida Ave...Donahue Rd...Airport Rd...and Military Rd. Swift flood waters will cover some roads. This stage corresponds roughly to a Phase 1 flood in the Lewis County flood system. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM PST Saturday the stage was 171.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 PM PST Saturday was 174.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 159.3 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 168.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 345 AM PST.
